item.title: eKiosk Products Page
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information The Products page of the eKiosk allows the customer to view product’s information without having to do any purchase. It acts like a price checker. Products Features This section of the eKiosk contains certain features to help the customer to find his item quickly. Here is a list of what this page supports: Search: […]

item.title: eKiosk Overview
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information The SMS eKiosk option provides a convenient, time-saving kiosk solution accessible on a Kiosk system. The option’s design is similar to the eStore concept, which is very much user-friendly and provides specific features for ordering. Features The eKiosk contains a specific set of features to be used in a store by the customers. It […]
